name: COLON_RECTUM_BIOP
description: Stores data for College of American Pathologists (CAP) form 76014-COLON AND RECTUM: Excisional Biopsy (Polypectomy).

columns.name: RESULT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the result record.

columns.name: TUMOR_SITE_SPECIFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify tumor site.

columns.name: CAP_COMMENTS
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: General comments.

columns.name: SPEC_INTEGRITY_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specimen Integrity.
entries: Single intact specimen (margins can be evaluated)
Multiple designated specimens (e.g., main excision and identified margins)
Fragmented (margins cannot be evaluated with certainty)

columns.name: HISTO_TYPE_SPECIFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify histologic type.

columns.name: POLYP_CONFIGURATN_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Polyp Configuration.

columns.name: PENDNCLTD_STALK_LEN
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Pedunculated Stalk Length.

columns.name: POLYP_SIZE_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Polyp Size.
entries: Multifocal tumor / discontinuous tumor at primary site (skip metastasis)

columns.name: POLYP_SIZE_GREATEST
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Polyp Size Greatest Dimension.

columns.name: POLYP_SIZE_ADDL_DIM
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Polyp Size Length.

columns.name: POLYP_SIZE_ADDL_2
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Polyp Size Width.

columns.name: POLYP_SIZE_SPECIFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify Polyp Size.

columns.name: HISTOLOGIC_GRADE_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Histologic Grade.
entries: Favorable (purely epithelial, fetal subtype, mitotically inactive with <=2 mitoses in
Less favorable (all subtypes other than those designated "Favorable" or "Unfavorable"
Unfavorable (small cell undifferentiated or rhabdoid as the predominant or sole histo

columns.name: INV_CARC_SIZE_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Size of Invasive Carcinoma.

columns.name: INV_CARCINOMA_GREAT
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Invasive Carcinoma Greatest Dimension.

columns.name: INV_CARC_ADDL_DIM
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Invasive Carcinoma Length.

columns.name: INV_CARC_ADDL_DIM2
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Invasive Carcinoma Width.

columns.name: INV_CARCINOMA_SPFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Invasive Carcinoma Specify.

columns.name: INV_CARC_CLOSE_MRG
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Invasive Carcinoma Distance from Closest Margin.

columns.name: MUCSL_INVL_ADENO_YN
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Mucosal / Lateral Margin Involved by Adenoma.

columns.name: MUCOSAL_LATER_MRG_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Mucosal / Lateral Margin.
entries: Margins involved by invasive carcinoma (tumor present 0-1 mm from margin)

columns.name: INV_CARC_AROSE_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Type of Polyp in Which Invasive Carcinoma Arose.

columns.name: ADDL_PATH_FIND_SPFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify additional pathologic findings.

columns.name: ANC_STDIES_SPFY_TYP
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Ancillary Studies Specify Types.

columns.name: INFLAM_BOWEL_DIS_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Inflammatory Bowel Disease.
